body:
well as you may know I quit minecraft. If it's possible can someone transfer my gold rank to my brother JJTheGuy. 


This is my official goodbye! So good luck in life! It was fun playing with everyone

title: Rank transfer

replies.body: bai dude. And yes it is possible, you have to cotact one iof the sr mods for it I believe.

replies.body:
dont think you can transfer ranks unless it's to an alt

sorry bud

replies.body:
If you can't, that's pretty stupid, since you're giving it to your brother.

IMO, you should be able to give it to someone who's parents (probably) paid for it.
